CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The energy levels , absorption spectra and band gaps of the resulting polymers were well tuned by utilizing different thiophene derivatives as spacer between IDT and NT units , and polymer PIDT-C12NT which employed bithiophene attached with dodecyl side chain as spacer exhibited superior properties compared to the other two copolymers.

Let's think step by step.

Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| different thiophene derivatives |
| IDT |
| NT |
| polymer PIDT-C12NT |
| bithiophene |
| dodecyl side chain |

The paragraph mentions several materials, including different thiophene derivatives, IDT, NT, polymer PIDT-C12NT, bithiophene, and dodecyl side chain. These entities are all materials, so they are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

After reviewing the list of entities, I will remove the entities that do not clearly refer to "Material Name". Here are the revised "Material Name" entities in the paragraph:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| polymer PIDT-C12NT |

The paragraph mentions several materials, but only polymer PIDT-C12NT is clearly a material. The other entities, such as different thiophene derivatives, IDT, NT, bithiophene, and dodecyl side chain, are either not clearly materials or are components of materials. Therefore, I have only included polymer PIDT-C12NT in the revised list of "Material Name" entities.

Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The energy levels , absorption spectra and band gaps of the resulting polymers were well tuned by utilizing different thiophene derivatives as spacer between IDT and NT units , and polymer PIDT-C12NT which employed bithiophene attached with dodecyl side chain as spacer exhibited superior properties compared to the other two copolymers.

| absorption spectra |
| band gaps |
| spacer |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| energy levels |
| absorption spectra |
| band gaps |
| superior properties |

Explanation:

* "spacer" is not a material property, it is a component or feature of the material.
* The term "superior properties" is a general term and not a specific material property, but it is included as it is a relative comparison of the properties of the material.
